COMMENT.mean: Let's just say Ashley is one of a kind...literally.
COMMENT.nice: Ashley is my...something from another mother! I've got Ashley's back, and Ashley has mine. We're tight, you know?

COMMENT.mean: Billy is loco, man. They say he took his own eye out, just so he could take a look at what was underneath the sofa.
COMMENT.nice: Billy is the kind of guy that would give an eye and a leg to help some one out...er, I mean arm and a leg.

COMMENT.mean: I'm pretty sure i've seen Brian walk around at night carrying a swag bag. Not been able to catch him red handed yet though.
COMMENT.nice: Brian is always helping out the elderly. It's nice that he devotes his time to others.

COMMENT.mean: Some people say Dave is Santa Clause. But he's too short, bald as a coot, and 'plays' with kids. At least he's fat enough for it.
COMMENT.nice: Dave is great with the kids when he comes round to babysit. They're an unruly bunch, but he holds his own and allows us to have some time for us.

COMMENT.mean: What a poser that Dennis guy is. Who does he think he is? He's always trying to hit on the wife. Well, next time i'll show him what hitting is...
COMMENT.nice: Me and the wife go for dinner with Dennis and his other half quite a lot. The wife knows him from way back when, and we're proud to call him our friend.

COMMENT.mean: I reckon that Diana could take on Dennis in a fight and kick his ass. You seen the muscles on her? Steroids, surely.
COMMENT.nice: Diana is great. She whipped the wife back into shape after we had our fifth child. She has a backside to rival Beyonce, I can tell you...erm, the wife, I mean...

COMMENT.mean: Geoff thinks he is Will.i.am, nut really he's just 'special'. You catch my drift?
COMMENT.nice: Geoff is really talented. He is the spitting image of Will.i.am. I hope he goes far, and when he does, it couldn't of happened to a nicer guy.

COMMENT.mean: Jennifer is the town bike. Every guy has ridden her. When I found out, I wasn't too happy about having to nip down to the local clinic.
COMMENT.nice: Jennifer is great, man. We get on like a house on fire. She is so nice to every one though. Wouldn't say boo to a goose.

COMMENT.mean: Jennifer...oh, you said Jessica, right? Doesn't really matter I suppose. You could mistake one for the other. They're both airheads.
COMMENT.nice: I'm a married man. I've got kids. Would I give them all up for Jessica? Possibly. Nah, only joking. But she is great.

COMMENT.mean: Who's Katie? Never heard of her. That says a lot really.
COMMENT.nice: Katie is a friend of one of my daugthers. Pleasent kid. I think she's a good influence for all of my kids.

COMMENT.mean: I once had an argument with Kerry. She threatened to put some kind of voodoo hex on me if i ever spoke ill of her again. Seriously what kind of person says that!...OUCH!!!
COMMENT.nice: Kerry is the kind of woman you can go and talk to about your troubles. Her advice is always sound.

COMMENT.mean: Is Mort an alien or something? I don't mean foreign, more like out of space or something. He's weird.
COMMENT.nice: Mort is a guy of few words, so when he does speak his words carry a lot of gravitas.

COMMENT.mean: Pat works at the local clinic. Always seems to perform tests that aren't necessary. Why did he have to cup my testicles, when I only went in for a sprained wrist???
COMMENT.nice: Pat is a Doctor at the local clinic. Probably knows me better than the wife. Top guy.

COMMENT.mean: Rich is the kind of guy who likes to mess with, just for giggles. He is so wealthy, he can get away with it.
COMMENT.nice: Rich made his money from banking. You've got to be of good character for that profession, right?

COMMENT.mean: Scooter isn't even his real name. His mother called him Meredith. So disrespectful.
COMMENT.nice: Scooter managed to sort out a little computer problem I had a while back. Claimed a virus put all that porn there. That calmed the wife down a bit.

COMMENT.mean: Take a look at 'it'. Do I need to say anything more???
COMMENT.nice: Top guy. Turned the town christmas lights on one year. It is an honour that, you know.

COMMENT.mean: The word is that Susan dresses as a nun to hide from some gangsters she pissed off. Great character, huh?
COMMENT.nice: She is nun, man. Do I need to add anything else?

COMMENT.mean: Tifa is really a guy. True story. She is really called Cloud. Nobody else knows, and I hope it stays that way. You hear me?
COMMENT.nice: Tifa always seems to save the day. Whenever things look like going arse backwards, she comes to the rescue.

COMMENT.mean: What a greedy ass Adam is. About everything. Food. Money. Even women. Don't even get me started about the women!
COMMENT.nice: Adam is like the uncle you never had. Always happy go lucky.

RANDOM.comment: People always seem surprised when I tell then i'm happily married with 5 kids, and I can support them without the need to claim any state benefits.
Can't a guy take pride in his appearance?
I've got my eye on you. We've got enough fish in this pond. You get me?
